thread.title: Breathe eCig Corp. Announces Update for New York and Knoxville Promotional Tour
thread.title_full: Breathe eCig Corp. Announces Update for New York and Knoxville Promotional Tour - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Breathe eCig Corp. Announces Update for New York and Knoxville Promotional Tour
text:
Breathe eCig Corp.
NEW YORK , October 7, 2015 /PRNewswire/ --
Breathe eCig Corp. (OTCQB: BVAP) ("Breathe" or the "Company"), an electronic cigarette industry innovator and pioneer, today announced additional elements of its on going marketing campaign targeting New York , Knoxville and eCommerce sales.
Musical group Loose Screws joins Machine Gun Kelly on the Road Tripping Tour beginning October 6, 2015 for a total of 13 shows at major venues. The details of the tour dates can be found at the following link: http://www.machinegunkelly.com/tour .
Loose Screws tour dates are part of an ongoing cross-promotion marketing campaign with the group which includes the hot single "Breathe Owee" and the related music video soon to be released. Go to https://soundcloud.com/loosescrews/breathe-ooh-wee .
At each tour venue, the Company will focus on capturing consumer data, promoting a solid brand awareness and leveraging the band's following across social media. All data is leveraged by the Company to build awareness and help drive ecommerce revenues.
On completion of the Loose Screws' promotional tour, the Company's focal point will be the return to the corporate headquarter's in Knoxville Tennessee with the band where an official launch party will take place and the Company will showcase its products. The Company intends to develop a strong relationship in the Knoxville market given it is the birthplace and origin of its proprietary technology and inspiration.
Josh Kimmel , Breathe's Chief Executive Officer, stated, "The Company will mobilize a promotional street sales team and use a direct approach educating both retailers and consumers on Breathe's premium product. Our goal is to engage on a personal level while reinforcing brand awareness and product positioning."
About Breathe eCig Corp. (OTCQB: BVAP)
Breathe was founded in 2012 as a research and development company in Knoxville, Tennessee with the mission to develop a better e-cigarette than was available on the market. Now holding multiple patents (pending) for its groundbreaking product, BVAP, Breathe is not your typical e-cig manufacturer. With a commitment to remaining socially responsible through innovative product development, consumer outreach and education, Breathe challenges the e-cig industry establishment. To find out more, visit http://www.breathecig.com .
